nodes.text: Star Wars: Tatooine Adventures is a Level 1 DK Reader. It was released on January 17, 2011. Written by Clare Hibbert, it has 32 pages.
Take a trip to the sandy planet of Tatooine and meet the people and strange creatures who live there!
Tatooine Adventures introduces readers to the hostile desert planet of Tatooine, home of Anakin Skywalker, Luke Skywalker, Jawas, Sand People, and Jabba the Hutt.
